name: Cloudcorner.net NAS
body:
Welcome to this Git-hub project pages !

You will found here a small repository with some of my NAS / Netapp related scripts, more will come.

## About Me

I am Datacenter IT architect specialize in Storage/Backup/Virtualization and much more !
If you want to know more about me just check my [linkedin profile](http://www.linkedin.com/profile/view?id=67537402&trk=tab_pro) page.

## netapp.config.maker.py

This script will create .config and .rc file for Netapp nas filer based on a XML configuration file.

### Requirements / Pre-requisites

This script require Python 2.X run on a Linux server, haven't test on windows
few python libs (lxml, argparse)

### usage

from a linux server :

`#shell> netapp.config.maker.py [-h] -c configfile [-v]`


### Quick help

`
usage: netapp.config.maker.py [-h] -c configfile [-v]

.config and .rc file generator based on XML config file for Netapp filer

optional arguments:
  -h, --help            show this help message and exit
  -c configfile, --configfile configfile
                        XML config file
  -v, --vfiler          vfiler config generator only
`

## Authors and Contributors

Author: Shah Mohsin WAHED |[linkedin profile](http://www.linkedin.com/profile/view?id=67537402&trk=tab_pro)


## Support or Contact

Having trouble with the scripts within this repository ?
Contact me.
